rounds.response:
A decent hand this time: K♥ T♦ – Broadway cards, both suited and connected.

I’m out of the blinds (I’m the SB), so I’ll treat this as a standard steal spot against only one opponent. I’m 40 chips behind, and P1 has been aggressive pre-flop. Rather than just call the current small blind of 20, I’ll come in for a reasonable 3-bet to put pressure on him and try to take down the blinds now. I’ll bet 3× the current bet (20) plus some extra to account for the aggression so far – a raise to 80 total.

[Raise 80]
